item.title: Creating a Discord Bot
item.description: My hilarious journey at creating a discord bot

item.title: About
item.description: About me Oh… You Actually want to know something about me? Jeez… Fine. I’m currently 17 years old. (TODO: Update this page next year) I’m still in highschool, and I’m also working as a software developer for an undisclosed OSS project. I grew interest in computers at a young age. I still vividly remmeber booting up my enourmous 2001 notebook to play Trackmania united in my childhood. Fun times. I also used to game a lot, and since gaming in 2012 with a Wii was hard, I had to get my way around most of the problems I had.
